箱中气候.encontent:
Sunshine?! I gotta stay away ... before the rashes
 get on me again.
箱中气候.content:
阳光？！我得赶紧躲起来，在……在红疹子冒出来之前躲
起来。

致未来.encontent:
Emm ... I'm just a ghost, dead, no future ahead. I hope you can
 understand.Oh, I'm not judging your idea. They are very lovely
 thoughts ... perfect thoughts.
致未来.content:
呃……我只是个幽灵。我死了，我没有未来。我希望你明
白这一点。当然，我不是在挑剔你的想法，它们很好……很
完美。

孑立.encontent:
No ... don't! Where did you go? Oh my god ... Where
 are you? Don't leave me alone! Please ...
孑立.content:
不……不行！你在哪儿？天啊……你在哪儿？别留我一个
人！别……

问候.encontent: Welcome to my place. We can ... play together here.
问候.content: 欢迎你来我家。你可以在这……在这和我一起玩。

朝晨.encontent:
I've made you breakfast, but it's all ruined by the
 seawater dripping off my sheets.This is just like
 the party I went to, so ruined ... Haha ...
朝晨.content:
我准备了早餐，但是它们都被我身上滴下来的海水毁了。就
和我的派对一样，它们都毁了……哈哈……

信任-朝晨.encontent:
Hi, what did you dream about last night? You were mumbling
 in your dream.I could barely hear anything even though
 I have moved very very close to you.
信任-朝晨.content:
嗨，你好，你昨天晚上梦到什么了？你的梦话太小声了，即
使我凑到你嘴边也没能听清楚。

夜暮.encontent:
Listen! Did you hear that? The ticking sound of a clock.This
 ... this is too quiet, nobody noticed me, nobody looked
 over, I ... I ...
夜暮.content:
你听见了吗？听见了吗？滴滴答答作响的闹钟。太……太
安静了，没人发现我，没人看我，我……我……

信任-夜暮.encontent:
Can you stay? Can we talk, just ... just for a while. Please
 look at me. But ... not for too long. You can watch me for 3.5
 seconds, and look away for ... for 5 seconds. Then look back
 at me again.
信任-夜暮.content:
你能陪我说说话吗？就一会儿……好好看着我。但……但
也别看太久。如果可以看我3.5秒，然后看别处，看……看
5秒，再来看我。

帽檐与发鬓.encontent: It's always so wet, sometimes itchy ... What is this?!
帽檐与发鬓.content: 潮湿，偶尔会发痒……这是什么？！

袖与手.encontent: Well ... I ... This is my finger, Ms. ...
袖与手.content: 呃……我……这是我的手指，小姐……

衣着与身形.encontent:
Are you saying ... people only have two legs? Ooh!
 But how did I get this leg? No. Wait! I'm trying to
 recall ...
衣着与身形.content:
你的意思是……一个人只有两只腿？呃……我的天！那我
的腿是哪儿来的呢？天啊！等我，再等我想一想……

嗜好.encontent:
Sometimes I would watch TV, those drama series were
 so great.And mom would bring me apple pie and soda.
 Um ... I really miss times like that.
嗜好.content:
我偶尔会看电视，电视剧里的故事很精彩，而妈妈会准备
苹果派和苏打水。呃……我很怀念那个时候。

赞赏.encontent:
You're totally far out! Even beat the most popular
 girls.
赞赏.content: 你比那些最受欢迎的姑娘还酷！

亲昵.encontent:
I like new sheets, or as long as it is cleaned. But
 don't take them off me, please.
亲昵.content: 新的床单，或者洗干净的也可以，但不要让我脱下来。

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
I think I dig it ... I must have picked up an extra leg from
 the sea ... but I don't remember which one is mine, not to mention
 that I have picked up more than one leg ...
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
我想我明白了……我从海中多捡了一只腿回来……我不知
道哪一条才是“不属于我”的，但我想我不止捡了一条腿
回来……

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
I looked up in the water, watching the last breath
 of oxygen flee in bubbles,then I heard ringing in
 my ears ...
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
在水面之下，我肺里最后一丝氧气也变成了一串气泡，然
后我开始耳鸣……

独白.encontent:
I'm not pretty enough. I have thick legs and freckles.I'm not
 even close to being as pretty as those people on TV or as popular
 as other students.I like my bedsheet. It's great. It protects
 me.I will come out of my sheets when I'm less afraid, in near
 future ... theoretically ...
独白.content:
我长得不够漂亮，腿不够细，皮肤上也有雀斑。我远不如
电视剧里那些人，也不如学校里那些人。被单很好，很好
。它可以挡住我。等到我不那么怕的时候，我会出来的，在
未来……理论上来说……

战前.encontent: This is gonna be a haunted house.

召唤至终的仪式.encontent: Please look over here ... Ooh! No no no!
召唤至终的仪式.content: 请你注意下这边吧……哇！不要看过来！

战斗胜利.encontent:
Perfect ... They have noticed me, and ... and didn't
 stare for awkwardly long. I enjoyed this ...
战斗胜利.content:
太好了……他们看见我，但是……没有看太久，这很完美
……

洞悉之底.encontent:
What do you think of my beachwear? Does it look bad?
 Yes ... yes?
洞悉之底.content: 你觉得我的泳衣怎么样？很糟吗？是……是吗？
